headline.print_headline: Jailed Ex-Strongman Noriega Says Damaged by Video Game Portrayal
headline.main: Jailed Ex-Strongman Noriega Says Damaged by Video Game Portrayal

docs.snippet: Former dictator Manuel Noriega may be serving time in a Panamanian prison for the killing of political opponents, but that doesn't mean he likes being portrayed in a video game as a murderer....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former dictator Manuel Noriega may be serving time in a Panamanian prison for the killing of political opponents, but that doesn't mean he likes being portrayed in a video game as a murderer.

headline.print_headline: Halting Effects of Alcohol Linked to How the Worm Turns: Study
headline.main: Halting Effects of Alcohol Linked to How the Worm Turns: Study

docs.snippet: Mutant worms generated at a lab at the University of Texas may provide a pathway to prevent people from becoming intoxicated after drinking alcohol, a study released on Wednesday said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mutant worms generated at a lab at the University of Texas may provide a pathway to prevent people from becoming intoxicated after drinking alcohol, a study released on Wednesday said.

headline.print_headline: Immigration Leads to O'Malley and Obama Spat
headline.main: Immigration Leads to O'Malley and Obama Spat

docs.snippet: Maryland Gov. Martin O'Malley was one of President Barack Obama's top fundraisers in 2012, raising more than $1 million for his re-election campaign and supporting him regularly on political talk shows. Now, O'Malley is finding out what it's like ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Maryland Gov. Martin O'Malley was one of President Barack Obama's top fundraisers in 2012, raising more than $1 million for his re-election campaign and supporting him regularly on political talk shows. Now, O'Malley is finding out what it's like to be on Obama's bad side.

headline.print_headline: Colorado Sues Two Foreclosure Law Firms for Fraud
headline.main: Colorado Sues Two Foreclosure Law Firms for Fraud

docs.snippet: Colorado's attorney general has sued the state's two largest foreclosure law firms, accusing them of defrauding homeowners, investors and taxpayers by padding costs and expenses, court documents made public on Wednesday show....
docs.lead_paragraph: Colorado's attorney general has sued the state's two largest foreclosure law firms, accusing them of defrauding homeowners, investors and taxpayers by padding costs and expenses, court documents made public on Wednesday show.

headline.print_headline: GM to Review, Reorganize Legal Dept in Response to Recall
headline.main: GM to Review, Reorganize Legal Dept in Response to Recall

docs.snippet: General Motors Co has appointed an outside law firm to investigate its legal department, which is under fire for its role in the company's mishandled ignition switch recall, the automaker's top lawyer will announce at a Senate hearing....
docs.lead_paragraph: General Motors Co has appointed an outside law firm to investigate its legal department, which is under fire for its role in the company's mishandled ignition switch recall, the automaker's top lawyer will announce at a Senate hearing.

headline.print_headline: VA a No Show; Store Workers Fix Vet's Wheelchair
headline.main: VA a No Show; Store Workers Fix Vet's Wheelchair

docs.snippet: What the Veterans Administration failed to do for double amputee Michael Sulsona in two years, some New York hardware store workers delivered in an hour: They fixed his broken wheelchair....
docs.lead_paragraph: What the Veterans Administration failed to do for double amputee Michael Sulsona in two years, some New York hardware store workers delivered in an hour: They fixed his broken wheelchair.

headline.print_headline: Wisconsin Moms May Be Charged After Joy Rides by Sons, 4 and 9
headline.main: Wisconsin Moms May Be Charged After Joy Rides by Sons, 4 and 9

docs.snippet: Two Wisconsin mothers could be charged with child neglect after their sons, ages 9 and 4, stole two cars from a town northwest of Milwaukee in the last month and went on joy rides, police said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two Wisconsin mothers could be charged with child neglect after their sons, ages 9 and 4, stole two cars from a town northwest of Milwaukee in the last month and went on joy rides, police said on Wednesday.
